short_description: escrow world is a debt collection agency based in los angeles, california, united states.
long_description: includes office buildings, strip malls, hotels, medical centers and multi family housing with 4+ units. opened in 2012 by ceo gina kang and her seasoned staff of industry professionals, escrow world, inc. is located in downtown los angeles and serves the greater los angeles community. we specialize in commercial escrow, while offering the full gamut of escrow services. customers satisfaction is our only goal. our team is a seasoned group of industry professionals, and each member has been hand selected to ensure the utmost experience, excellence and honesty in our field. led by owner and founder, gina kang, her vast industry knowledge and high level of integrity are well respected throughout southern california's real estate landscape. gina kang is an accomplished and exceptional escrow expert with a track record spanning over 20 years in los angeles. as ceo and founder, gina's history of success continues to flourish by delivering unrivaled leadership with a keen eye that provides accuracy, discretion and excellence.

generated_description: escrow world inc. is a company that provides comprehensive commercial escrow services in southern california. they specialize in meeting the escrow needs of various types of properties, including office buildings, strip malls, hotels, medical centers, and multi-family housing with 4+ units. the company is led by ceo and sr. escrow officer, gina kang, who has over 20 years of experience in the industry and is highly regarded for her industry knowledge and integrity. the team also includes partners and senior escrow officers, such as shari chen and janice cheon, who ensure that customers are paired with the best officer for their specific business needs. additionally, the company's marketing director, sunny kim, emphasizes the importance of building trust in relationships as the key to success.
